input_text:
Job Title: MultiMedia/Web Designer

Location: Myrtle Beach, SC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Company DescriptionCRM Services is a provider of comprehensive property repair, maintenance, and construction solutions for Property Managers, Property Owner Associations, and Home Owner Associations throughout the U.S. Our services range from new construction and renovation to everyday maintenance, with a focus on efficiency and professionalism. With our turn-key solutions, we ensure the lasting value of your property. Our services include Property Maintenance, Construction, Landscaping, Plumbing, HVAC, Electrical, FF&E, Pools, Pressure Washing, Painting, and Carpet Cleaning.
Role DescriptionThis is a full-time role for a MultiMedia/Web Designer. The MultiMedia/Web Designer will be responsible for web design, graphic design, front-end development, and responsive web design. The role will be located on-site in Myrtle Beach, SC. Organized, detailed, and driven individual to be responsible for various website content updates, SEO, social media graphics. Reporting and assisting with the Marketing and Sales Departments.
QualificationsManage web content updates and maintenanceImplement new website features and content, including graphic elements, website navigation and page layoutProofreading, re-structuring and editing current website contentOffer recommendations for best practices and efficiencies in each phase of our projects (strategy, UI/UX, design, and development)Ensure high quality graphic and web standards that maintain brand consistencyActively maintain SEO for company websitesExecute Google Analytics reportsAssist with social media managementCollaborate with marketing team membersRegularly research brand trends, layouts, and best practicesMaintain short and long-term deadlinesCollaborate with our teams to ensure clean workflow of projects through discovery, design, development, final approval and deliveryProvide cross-functional support for company’s social media presence including developing targeted campaignsSupport the Marketing Director in strategic planning and execution of marketing campaignsOccasionally, travel will be requiredParticipation in Networking events, Chamber events, luncheons, trade shows, etc. is required.Create email campaigns, from design, testing, distribution and reporting
MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS:Bachelor’s degree in a related field; or equivalent combination of educationAdvanced knowledge of WordPress, plugins, SEO, and HTMLUI/UX design experienceProficient with Adobe Creative Suite including Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign requiredStrong understanding of typography, color, layout, and website interaction
 PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:Ability to create 3D presentation design drawings is a PLUS
Ideal candidate will have:Experience in WordPress, SEO, Adobe Creative Cloud, Microsoft Office, HTML, CSS, and/or JavaScriptMarketing experience in brand awareness with use of typography, digital, and printA basic understanding of the hospitality, construction, and/or maintenance industry

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: MultiMedia/Web Designer
output_json.summary: Full-time role for a MultiMedia/Web Designer responsible for web design, graphic design, front-end development, and responsive web design.

Email campaign creation, testing, distribution, and reporting

other.content: Bachelor’s degree in a related field; or equivalent combination of education, Advanced knowledge of WordPress, plugins, SEO, and HTML, UI/UX design experience, Proficient with Adobe Creative Suite including Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign required, Strong understanding of typography, color, layout, and website interaction
Ability to create 3D presentation design drawings is a PLUS

Experience in WordPress, SEO, Adobe Creative Cloud, Microsoft Office, HTML, CSS, and/or JavaScript, Marketing experience in brand awareness with use of typography, digital, and print, A basic understanding of the hospitality, construction, and/or maintenance industry
